Question: This person vowed to improve the economic situation in those areas, promising to deliver 200,000 jobs to the state over her term.
Hints: Books praising this person did not sell nearly as well (other than the memoirs written by her and her husband).
The campaigns of this person and Lazio, along with Giuliani's initial effort, spent a record combined $90 million.
This person said she accepted the conclusions of the report and that charges were underway to implement its suggested changes.
